scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the central cross, flanked by two thieves on crosses. Soldiers are present, one on horseback holding a spear, and others are involved in the crucifixion process, including one who appears to be offering vinegar to Christ. Below the crosses, a group of mourners is gathered, including the Virgin Mary, who is being comforted by John the Evangelist, and other women. The sky is dark and cloudy, with a crescent moon visible. The setting is an outdoor landscape with a distant city.
